articles.content: Looking ahead: Live translation is shaping up to be one of the most practical (and competitive) uses of generative AI, with real-life implications for how people communicate across languages. A new u… [+2684 chars]

articles.author: Zachy Hennessey
articles.title: “Younger people are getting cancer more and more. We have to make kinder medicines.” - CTech
articles.description: As AI hype accelerates, oncology’s real progress is happening quietly, driven by data, regulation, and the slow work of making cancer treatment more precise and sustainable
articles.content: Younger people are getting cancer more and more, said Sai Jasti, senior vice president and head of data science and AI at Bayer. And what that means is people may have to stay on therapies for longer… [+5934 chars]
